name: Jillian Robin
text: I ordered a medium thin Cajun crust, half pepperoni, half mushrooms and green olives. They put pepperoni, mushrooms and green peppers on it. I can't eat green peppers. I called and they said they'd get someone on the phone that could take ‚Ä¶More

name: princess Peach
text: First and last time I'll be ordering. Ordered a large pizza and a cheese bread online said it would be ready in 15 minutes arrived in 25 minutes was told it would be just a few more minutes. Came back in in 5 minutes then was told someone ‚Ä¶More

name: Diane Lawrence
text: The pizza was great but it was the service that was bad. I placed the order on the app at 6:35pm and  said ready for 7pm. I arrive and had to wait 25 minutes! Was told 3 times,  it's just coming out. When I asked for a manager, it was suddenly done.  They forgot the bread dipping sauce too.

name: Ally
text: Edit in response:  Sorry, but this is not the first time.  We have tried multiple times with detailed complaints and the assurance that you want to "fix it" but nothing has changed.  This isn't a one star because of one bad experience-this ‚Ä¶More

name: Austin Dunn
text: We order pizza and 3 cheese bread tonight for dinner while at my parents. In the section for special instructions I asked ‚ÄúDraw a chicken on the box‚Äù and they fully delivered!

name: Mandy Anne
text: I don't like to complain but with our big orders we usually make i guess I  expect more...pizza was amazing, cheese bread as well. But the Buffalo chicken had sprinkles of Buffalo sauce on it and for what the cost is, I guess I expected ‚Ä¶More

name: Pete Norman
text: It happened again, I place and order online and the workers "forget" to make part of the order and then expect me to sit in the parking lot and wait while they make the rest of the order.  Meanwhile the rest of the pizza is getting cold in ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian Wilson
text: Good food, but I walked in to order and the young girl at the counter, after I asked what the specials were, was so distracted by the phones ringing, she rattled off a list of specials... Would be nice if they posted specials on a board, or separate the phone orders from the order taking at the counter

name: Adam LaBeau
text: Recently had a delivery and had some items missing.  After a phone call to the store that left the issue unresolved, I proceeded to give some online feedback.  The manager contacted me shortly after and more than made up for the error. ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Gosselin
text: As a former employee at this Hungry Howie‚Äôs location, I understand just how busy and overwhelming some dinner services can be; however, I feel comfortable calling the service I received tonight an utter failure. When busy, there can be a ‚Ä¶More

name: Jesse Lee
text: Forgot to give us the whole order. Even after looking at the receipt.

name: Linda Jedele
text: On August 15 your store was closed due to a power outage. I had no clue. I spent 17 minutes on the phone waiting for someone to answer. Meanwhile trying to place my order on line. I wasted over an hour trying to place a $50 order. ‚Ä¶More

name: Debbie Baxter
text: Ordered on line like I always do. We ordered two pizzas, both with pineapple, only one had pineapple. Since we didn't want to drive back to Brooklyn to return the wrong pizza, I was told they would not do anything about it. No credit on our ‚Ä¶More

name: Noah Evans
text: Best pizza in the area, and they deliver to Onsted!

name: S west
text: Understandably the place is busy but this time and the time before I had to wait after I got there for my carry out order well after the scheduled time. Either for something that was forgotten or otherwise. Staff is friendly but unorganized and too short staffed.

name: Lynell Dillay
text: Ordered food last week and it was really good. Ordered the exact same thing this week with a few add on‚Äôs it was horrible.  Subs had a quarter of the toppings and was greasy. Had it delivered. We were missing 2 items and got 2 random items. ‚Ä¶More

name: Britney Tomlinson
text: I love them but this is the 3rd time ive ordered and they forgot my sauces. I pay extra for them so i should get them. Disappointed.

name: LEM
text: Ordered 2 pizzas tonight. They arrived quick which was great, however they were lacking in toppings. We called and spoke with the manager he apologized for the inconvenience and replaced our pizzas. They are fantastic! Thank you

name: bryan guenther
text: Food is good but they struggle to get your order right

text: Friendly staff and totally spotless. Will being going back soon!

text: Look at all the grease off the pizza. They even messed up the pizza. It was supposed to be no black olives, red onions, mushrooms, and green peppers. Called and they are going to replace the pizza on my next order.

name: tatumwildcat123

name: Joanna Roy
text: I love this pizza place. I feel like family when i arrive....maybe cuz i order like 2 times a week but they are always so nice. I havent had not one single prob with them. Im sad i had to move away tho so i will no longer be goin here. I moved and the hungry howies by me sucks tbh. I miss this place :(....do you deliver 40 mins away??

name: Nine C74
text: Thats NOT steak.... Thats Nasty. Your foods going down hill...if i wanted the equivolant of banquet chicken nuggets and mystery i meat, that resembles sliced Alpo, i'd go to country market and buy just that.... Over $30 for garbage...Ill Never do it again.

name: Bob Updike
text: Good pizza

name: Michelle Cooper
text: Yummy pizza and pick any kind.

name: Shawna Weber
text: So disappointed in my pie. I have moved and no longer have one where I live. It had hardly any cheese and you could literally count using 2 hands the number of green peppers, onions and ham on the pizza. They used to have the BEST pie for a decently priced place, and not skimp on the toppings.

name: Larry Goetz
text: Won't go back! First experience last week. 1, online prices are wrong. 2, pretty skimpy on the veggies. 3, wrong crust. 4, Asian wings ordered, Buffalo delivered,(had to rinse them off in the sink) 5, No free delivery. There is way too much competition to go back there.

name: Caitlyn Kidle
text: I order from here weekly. Never have an issue.. pizza and bread sticks are always hot and done pergectly. I don't use delivery, I go in and pick up and I'm always greeted with smiles :)

name: Delilah Lozier
text: Love the pizza and subs!

name: Linda Reiser
text:
Poor staffing ,haven't  ordered  anything  since..
Made s complaint and never was handled  properly  as i work close with Business..They was so rude and unprofessional

name: Janet Moody
text: Good good and service!

name: Tony Rankin
text: Ordered dinner to pick up and walked in the store 5 employees standing around not one acknowledged that I was at the counter. Got my food home and the dressing packet for my salad was torn open and stapled back shut.

name: Josh B

name: Melissa Bloom

name: Christina Williams
text: My pizza was super hot, absolutely wonderful customer service and great prices. I love this place!

name: deirdre nau
text: Ordered 3 times to give it a chance,  pick up,like eating cardboard with cheese on it, different kid behind the counter every time. Questions were not answered and unwelcome.

name: bobby black
text: Crust was bland with no flavor at all, garlic herb on the receipt, hungry howie's is known for the famous flavored crust. Please stop forgetting to flavor our crust üëçüèº

name: Kelly Davis
text: This place thinks a calzone is a sub , so what else should I say , Italian receipt,  I'll never know cause I wanted a calzone , but for some reason. They showed me a menu and they had deli meats on a sub bun , I never laughed so hard ,

name: Alison Quigg
text: What the bleep, Brooklyn Hungry Howies no longer delivers to our house. We have ordered from there for years. Guess Marcos will be getting new customers. Very Irritated on Wolf Lake Road.

text: Although the pizza was quite good, after we ordered and waited 50 minutes to get there, they hadn't even started our order. We had to wait an additional 12 minutes to get our order, so this was very disappointing.

A call letting us know would have been nice to say the least.

text: We ordered a Hungry Howie's pizza when our grandchildren came to visit. It was the best pizza we have had in years. Thank you Hungry Howie's for a great dinner.
